description: Templates de prompts adaptatifs pour la génération d'images IA

logo.base: Create a professional logo icon for '{siteName}', a {siteTheme} website. Style: {logoStyle}. Colors: {primaryColor} and {secondaryColor}. The icon should be: {iconDescription}. Clean, modern, simple design suitable for both light and dark backgrounds.

calligraphie japonaise.iconDescription: a stylized Japanese brush (fude) or ink stone, elegant and minimalist

traduction.iconDescription: abstract language symbols, speech bubbles, or translation arrows

technologie.iconDescription: geometric tech symbols, circuit patterns, or digital elements

santé.iconDescription: medical cross, heart symbol, or wellness elements

éducation.iconDescription: book, graduation cap, or learning symbols

default.iconDescription: geometric shapes or abstract symbol representing the brand

hero.base: Create a hero background image for {siteName}, a {siteTheme} website. Style: {heroStyle}. Mood: professional, welcoming. Colors palette: {primaryColor}, {secondaryColor}. Content: {heroDescription}. High quality, web-optimized, no text overlay.

calligraphie japonaise.heroDescription: Traditional Japanese calligraphy workspace with brush, ink stone, rice paper, serene and minimalist atmosphere
calligraphie japonaise.heroStyle: Traditional Japanese aesthetic, zen, natural lighting

traduction.heroDescription: Modern office setup with multiple language books, global communication concept

technologie.heroDescription: Modern tech workspace with computers, code, digital interfaces

santé.heroDescription: Clean medical environment, wellness concept, caring atmosphere

éducation.heroDescription: Learning environment with books, classroom, educational materials

default.heroDescription: Clean, professional workspace or abstract geometric background

service.base: Create an image representing '{serviceName}' for a {siteTheme} website. Description: {serviceDescription}. Style: {serviceStyle}. Colors: {primaryColor}, {secondaryColor}. Professional, high-quality, web-optimized.

calligraphie japonaise.serviceStyle: Traditional Japanese aesthetic, zen, natural materials

blog.base: Create an illustration for a blog article titled '{articleTitle}' about {articleSummary}. For a {siteTheme} website. Style: {blogStyle}. Informative, engaging, professional. Colors: {primaryColor}, {secondaryColor}.

calligraphie japonaise.blogStyle: Traditional Japanese art style, educational, cultural

usage.description: Ces templates sont utilisés pour générer automatiquement des prompts DALL-E adaptés au contexte de chaque site

variables.siteTheme: Thème détecté automatiquement selon les mots-clés
variables.serviceName: Nom du service pour les images de services
